name: Sudoku #
description:
You won’t be looking for a paper puzzle ever again!

Sudoku for everyone from beginners to advanced level players. Whether you like to relax or keep your mind active, pass your free time in a pleasant way! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with sudoku.

Sudoku is a logic-based, combinatoric digit input puzzle game of numbers. Become more intelligent by playing this game regularly. Concentrate and analyse each brainteaser puzzle to finish the game. The objective of this game is to place the numbers 1 to 9 digit into each grid cell so that each number can only appear once in each row, each column and each mini-grid.

Take your favourite app with you wherever you go.

Features
• Challenge yourself figuring out your mistakes or enable Auto-Check to see your mistakes as you go
• Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
• Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
• Hints can guide you when you are stuck
• Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly!
• Auto-save. If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
• Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
• Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes
• More than 5,000 well-formed puzzles
• 9x9 grid
• 4 perfectly balanced levels: Easy, Medium, Hard and Expert
• Clean interface and smooth controls
